package Basic;

public class This_method {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		pranita p=new pranita();
		p.work();
		
	}

}


class pranita
{
	void xyz()
	{
		this.color("black");
		System.out.println("XYZ.....");
	}
	
	void color(String n)
	{
		System.out.println(n);
	}
	void work()
	{
		this.xyz();
		System.out.println("Hiii....Welcome");
	}
	
}
